column3: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering
column5: This course provides scope to study a range of topics from the electrical engineering field, including:power networkselectrical machinesdrives and motor controlenergy conversionpower electronic convertersAlso available are more application focused modules covering topics such as power systems for transportation and renewable energy.Our objective is to help you develop the confidence to work as a professional, at ease with the conventions of the discipline, and ready to tackle any area of research in electrical engineering.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
